commentary: Are you following the sequence there? Study it carefully. If you understand what's going on, then congratulations, you understand troll romance and what a bad, stupid mess it all is. If you don't, that's fine I guess. If you aren't even bothering to look closely enough at the panel sequence to try and figure it out, well, I guess that's fine  too. If you aren't even bothering to read my notes down here? Can't say 1 blame you for that either. Oh, you say you didn't even bother opening the book? Alright, now you're just showing off, wise guy.
